original_title: 2 tsu no na o motsu otoko: Kyameraman Kimu Hakuson Kanai Seiichi no ashiato
overview: A filmmaker with three names—Hinatsu Eitaro in Japan, Huh Young in Korea, and Huyung in Indonesia—is known as the director of the lost film You and I (1941). Presented here is a retrospective look at a filmmaker who was a victim of his time.
title: The Man with Two Names Cameraman Kim Hak-seong, Kanai Seiichi
